title: Text of a Letter to Certain Congressional Committees on a Report in Accordance with the Elie Wiesel Genocide and Atrocities Prevention Act of 2018 – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
September 12, 2019
Dear Mr. Chairman:  (Dear Madam Chairwoman:)In accordance with section 5 of the Elie Wiesel Genocide and Atrocities Prevention Act of 2018 (Public Law 115‑441), I transmit herewith a report that includes a review of current efforts to prevent and respond to atrocities, a review of ongoing global atrocities, and recommendations to prevent and respond to atrocities produced in consultation with civil society and academic and other nongovernmental organizations and institutions.Sincerely,DONALD J. TRUMP
